resources.string: Whole module has been rewritten to support all latest Spotify versions. No more hard-coded version support. This means the module should survive Spotify updates, unless code changes considerably.

Features:
- Unlimited skips
- On-demand songs
- Disable shuffle

Tested on Spotify versions:
- Spotify 5.9.0.755 beta
- Spotify 5.9.0.771 beta
- Spotify 5.9.0.774
Special thanks to stirante for helping rewrite the module.
Special thanks to stirante for helping with the completely rewritten code.
